QuestData.Title: And the Sky Streaked Red
QuestData.Description: With Deathwing otherwise occupied, we have a grim and daunting task ahead of us, under charge of the queen herself. The black dragonflight is to be wiped out.$B$BI would welcome your aid in this, if it is offered. As soon as you are ready, I will send you with the next flight joining the attack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Join the assault on the black dragonflight.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems you are still with us. I'm somewhat appreciative of that.$B$BThank you.
